instruction: any good intense finance movies to watch?
output: If you're into high-stakes finance dramas, you gotta check out Margin Call! It's got that edge-of-your-seat Wall Street vibe with an all-star cast. Super gripping stuff about a financial crisis unfolding overnight. Totally worth a watch! 💼🔥🎬

instruction: i want a thriller about the stock market crash
output: Margin Call is perfect for that! It dives deep into the chaos of a financial meltdown, with tons of tension and smart storytelling. Plus, Kevin Spacey and the crew really bring it to life. Definitely a must-watch thriller for your list! 📉😲💸

instruction: looking for a drama about investment bankers and big money decisions
